author: breser
msg: Fix Perl bindings to work with VPATH builds.
Specify the path to the tests explicitly.
Specify the path to the .pm files explicitly.
Specify the man pages explicitly so they don't have garbage names.
Specify the full path to h2i.pl.
Clean up tabs from the Makefile.PL.in.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix potential security hole on Win32 platforms, introduced in r10620.
any path segment longer than 1 character consisting of just dots and spaces.

author: maxb
msg: Merge r10840 from trunk to 1.1.x branch.
Insert cancellation points for the list (ls) command.

author: maxb
msg: Merge r10926 from trunk to 1.1.x branch.
Fix pool lifetime bug in rev_hunt.c.
